articles.title: National Meeting Held to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Held to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A national meeting took place here on Sunday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and press organs, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators, working people in the city, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots and compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, Politburo member of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, made a report at the meeting.
					
					 The reporter said that the birth of Kim Jong Il as the son of legendary guerillas in Mt. Paektu was a great fortune of the Korean nation that promised the brilliant future for the revolutionary cause of Juche and an event of world historic significance that brought about a bright prospect for the human cause of independence.
					
					 He stressed that the history of humankind has never known such peerlessly great man as Kim Jong Il who has steadily led the country and the nation and the revolution and construction to victory with his extraordinary ideological and theoretical wisdom, veteran and experienced leadership art and noble virtues.
					
					 The reporter went on:
					
					 What holds a distinguished position in Kim Jong Il's ideological and theoretical activities is the fact that he enriched President Kim Il Sung's idea giving importance to the military affairs in keeping with the requirements of the developing reality to formulate the philosophy on arms that the revolution is started, advanced and accomplished with arms and the principle of Songun that the army represents the party, state and people and, on this basis, expounded the theories of the Songun revolution in an overall way. 
					
					 He established the Korean-style state leadership system with the National Defence Commission as its backbone, thus providing a legal and institutional guarantee for developing the DPRK government into a powerful political weapon to apply the Songun idea and leadership of the party and comprehensively ensure the Songun politics in all realms of the revolution and construction.
					
					 He also formulated the lines of national reunification advanced by the President as the three charters for national reunification and set forth them as a banner of national reunification and an action program for achieving the independent and peaceful reunification. And he wisely led the struggle of the Korean people for their materialization to open up an epochal phase for national reunification.
					
					 Thanks to his independent and mature external political activities, the DPRK has positively contributed to global peace and the human cause of independence in the idea of independence, peace and friendship even under the complicated international situation and the dignity and influence of Songun Korea have been enhanced unprecedentedly in international arena while rapidly expanding its foreign relations.
					
					 The reporter stressed the need to bring the great heyday of Songun Korea, holding high the torch of a new great revolutionary surge Kim Jong Il kindled when he visited Kangson, the birthplace of the Chollima movement.
					
					 Noting that the south Korean conservative authorities dared defame the supreme dignity of the Korean people, totally denied the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration and unhesitatingly violated the north-south agreements adopted in the past, thus pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of war, the worst crisis, the reporter warned that if they challenge the DPRK to the last despite its repeated warnings, it would punish the group of traitors with decisive actions.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever develop the relations with the countries which are friendly towards it in the idea of independence, peace and friendship and positively contribute to the realization of the cause of global independence, the reporter stated.
					
					 He stressed that only victory and glory are always in store for Songun Korea led by Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly great man of Mt. Paektu who performed the undying feats to be recorded forever in the history of the country by guiding the party and the revolution during several decades of his great revolutionary career and is bringing the greatest heyday of prosperity for the country and the nation, which will shine more brilliantly.
					
					 Similar celebration meetings and rallies were held in different provinces, cities and counties of the country on the same day.

articles.title: Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
articles.content:
Congratulations to Kim Jong Il from Raul Castro Ruz
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a congratulatory message from Raul Castro Ruz, second secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Cuba, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, on Saturday on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The message wholeheartedly wished Kim Jong Il success in his work and good health.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Russia
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Russia
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Russia hosted a reception on Feb. 12 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Affairs of Russia Borodavkin, former Defence Minister of the Soviet Union Yazov, Chairman of the Russia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group of the State Duma Chilingarov and other members of the State Duma and the Federation Council and personages of political parties, ministries, organizations and institutions of Russia.
					
					 Ambassador Kim Yong Jae and staff members of the DPRK embassy were on hand.
					
					The participants laid floral baskets and flowers before the full-length portrait of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid profound tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the photos displayed on the theme of "Leader Kim Jong Il and youths."
					
					 Kim Yong Jae said at the reception that the birth of Kim Jong Il was a great auspicious event of the Korean nation as it promised the rosy future for carving out the Korean people's destiny and accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Saying that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Russia are now developing on better terms in politics, economy, culture and other fields under the deep care of the top leaders of the two countries, he expressed the expectation that the Russian people would register greater successes in the efforts to build powerful Russia.
					
					 Borodavkin in his speech wished Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK who has made great contribution to the development of the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries, good health and success in his work for the Korean people's welfare.
					
					 The treaty adopted between the two states and the agreements reached by the leaders of the two countries entirely conform with the interests of the two peoples, he said, adding: They are not only contribution to ensuring peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world but also reliable guarantee for further boosting the bilateral cooperation and strengthening cooperation in the international arena.
					
					 An art performance was given by Russian artistes at the reception.

articles.title: International Figure Skating Festival Opens
articles.content:
International Figure Skating Festival Opens
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The 18th Paektusan Prize International Figure Skating Festival opened with due ceremony at the Ice-Rink in Pyongyang on Sunday on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there were Vice-President of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly Yang Hyong Sop, Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Kim Jung Rin, officials concerned, overseas compatriots and foreign guests.
					
					 Entering the venue of the ceremony amid the warm welcome of the audience were figure skaters from the DPRK, China, Russia, Slovenia, Ukraine and France. 
					
					  Pak Hak Son, chairman of the Physical Culture and Sports Guidance Commission, said in his opening address that sportspersons of different countries have adorned the festival with splendor in praise of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the February holiday every year.
					
					 He expressed belief that the festival would register great success by efforts of Korean sportspersons and close friends of different countries.
					
					 There was a group performance of DPRK figure skaters at the ceremony.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, demonstrations were given by players of the DPRK and other countries who proved successful in various international tournaments.
					
					 The festival continues.

articles.title: Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Held to Celebrate February 16
articles.content:
Synchronized Swimming Demonstration Held to Celebrate February 16
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A synchronized swimming demonstration was given at the swimming pool of the Changgwang Health Complex here on Sunday to celebrate February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Appreciating the demonstration were Choe Thae Bok, Choe Yong Rim and officials concerned, working people in the city of Pyongyang, congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots, overseas Koreans and the chief of the Pyongyang mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front and foreign guests.
					
					 The performers impressively represented through graceful and attractive movements the people's boundless reverence for Kim Jong Il who is ushering in the great heyday of Songun Korea while making a long journey of patriotic devotion unprecedented in history.
					
					 Such movements requiring high skills as changes of formation, rising-up and jumps to the surface were acclaimed by the audience.
					
					 The demonstration well showed the revolutionary stamina of the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation.

articles.title: Celebration Performance Given by Youth Art Squad
articles.content:
Celebration Performance Given by Youth Art Squad
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The youth art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League gave an art performance at the Central Youth Hall on Feb. 14 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Through serial songs "Cantata to Comrade Kim Jong Il," "Jong Il Peak in Spring," "Birds of Various Species Fly into Jong Il Peak" and "Thunder over Jong Il Peak" the performers highly sang of Kim Jong Il who was born as the son of guerrillas and is glorifying Korea with responsibility for it.
					
					 Among the numbers were female solo "Tell, the Road of Songun," narration and female solo "General, Don't Tread Cold Snow-covered Road, Please" carrying deep reverence for Kim Jong Il who is bringing the great heyday of Songun Korea. The performers' earnest representation of them deeply touched the audience's heart.
					
					 There were also female solo "The Glow over Kangson" and male chorus "Hot-hearted Young People, Step Up the March of Grand Construction," which truthfully represented high spiritual world of the Korean youth determined to display once again the heroic mettle and perform merits in every working site for building a great prosperous and powerful nation as the elder generations did to open the Chollima era in the postwar period.
					
					 The performance was appreciated by Kim Jung Rin, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, and others.

articles.title: Endless Stream of Visitors Flows to Kim Jong Il's Birthplace
articles.content:
Endless Stream of Visitors Flows to Kim Jong Il's Birthplace
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- An endless stream of servicepersons and people of the DPRK following leader Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, with deep reverence is flowing to his old home in the Paektusan Secret Camp on the occasion of his birthday.
					 The home has been recently visited by nearly 10,000 working people from all walks of life.
					
					 The number of visitors to this time-honored sacred place of the Sun in the new century totals to 1.9 million of more than 36,180 organizations as of now, among them servicepersons, working people from all walks of life, youth and students, overseas compatriots and foreigners.
					
					 At least 12,600 compatriots from south Korea and abroad visited the home in the new century.
					
					 Also, 13,900 foreigners visited this place, among them the participants in the "Meeting for greeting the sun in the 21st century" which was held with attendance of many foreign friends from tens of countries and regions and international organizations.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian President
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Boris Tadzic, Serbian President, on Sunday on the occasion of the national day of Serbia.
					In the message he extended heartfelt congratulations to the Serbian President.

articles.title: Greetings to Serbian Prime Minister
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian Prime Minister
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Mirko Cvetkovic, Serbian prime minister, on Sunday on the occasion of the national day of Serbia.
					 The message wished the Serbian Prime Minister greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country and the welfare of the people.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Outcries for War against DPRK Flailed
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Outcries for War against DPRK Flailed
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the commander of the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces in south Korea blared that the south Korea-U.S. "combined air-force command" would be established and a new "operation plan" replacing "OPLAN 5027", a scenario for a nuclear war against the DPRK, be rounded off allegedly to take an "rapid counteraction" against it. He also blustered that the U.S. Eighth Army Command would be invariably stationed in south Korea even after the transfer of the "right to command wartime operation".
					 Meanwhile, the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers announced that they would apply the new "operation plan" to the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises to be scheduled in August.
					
					 A spokesman for the Korean National Peace Committee in a statement on Feb. 15 termed their remarks an unpardonable declaration of confrontation and war outcries as they fully represented the scheme of the U.S. war hawks to stifle the DPRK militarily and permanently occupy south Korea.
					
					 If the U.S. truly wants peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, it should discharge its duties as the signatory to the Korean Armistice Agreement and the very one responsible for the occurrence of the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Owing to the reckless moves of the U.S. warmongers, the strained inter-Korean relations are getting worse and the outbreak of a nuclear war on the peninsula is a matter of time.
					
					 Anyhow, the U.S. and the south Korean war hawks should be clearly mindful that they can not frighten the DPRK with any threat and provocation.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to ponder over the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by its moves for confrontation and war with the DPRK, abandon its hostile policy toward the latter and withdraw its aggressor forces from south Korea without delay.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Sophism for Confrontation Flayed
articles.content:
Greetings to Serbian President
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group is nowadays terming the statement of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea "blackmail" and calling for "resolute counteraction" against it.
					 This is nothing but a sinister and shameful, far-fetched assertion designed to evade the blame for having driven the inter-Korean relations to catastrophe and ignite a war against the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces at any cost, Minju Joson Sunday says in a signed commentary.
					
					 Citing facts to disclose that the Lee Myung Bak group is blackmailing the army and people of the DPRK while rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula more strained, the commentary goes on:
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group is that of fanatics keen on confrontation with the fellow countrymen and that of war maniacs who have driven the inter-Korean relations to an uncontrollable collapse.
					
					 As long as such political charlatans, bellicose forces take power, the inter-Korean relations can never be improved and the Korean nation can not be freed from the daily growing danger of a new war, a nuclear war.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group has already been politically sentenced to death by all Koreans. What remains to be done is to execute the sentence.

articles.title: Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks Censured
articles.content:
Traitor Lee Myung Bak's Reckless Remarks Censured
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, traitor Lee Myung Bak of south Korea appeared on a radio show to let loose a spate of nonsense that the south would "definitely keep the principle in the south-north relations," "would not make haste" with the normalization of the relations and "is ready to cooperate" with the north.
					 Commenting on such utterances, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 This is sophism aimed to evade the criminal responsibility for having bedeviled the inter-Korean relations, cover up their poor situation in which they have been driven into ditch as the refuse of the June 15 era of reunification and mislead the angry public opinion.
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is persisting in the confrontational stand vociferating about "adherence to the principle" even today when the inter-Korean relations have been put to the uncontrollable and hopeless, serious crisis. This indicates that he seeks to lead the already collapsed inter-Korean relations to a war without any idea to save the inter-Korean relations from the crisis.
					
					 Such criminal intention of the traitor is evidenced by his remarks that the south "would not make haste" with the normalization of the relations with the north.
					
					  The traitor was so impudent as to talk nonsense that the south is "ready to cooperate" with the north. His remarks are a third-rate deceptive trick to evade the blame for having violated the inter-Korean joint declarations and spoiled the dialogue and cooperation and divert the public opinion at home and abroad elsewhere.
					
					 As already and evidently declared, such anti-reunification traitor as Lee Myung Bak can never be a dialogue partner of the DPRK.
					
					 What the Lee Myung Bak group talking about "adherence to the principle" will face is only its shameful destruction, the commentary concludes.

articles.title: U.S. Forces Commander's Remarks Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Forces Commander's Remarks Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Action Headquarters of the Youth and Students Solidarity for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration to Force the Lee Myung Bak Regime to Step Down in south Korea made public a statement on Feb. 11 to slash at the bellicose remarks made by the commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea.
					 The above-said commander in a recent press interview claimed that they would prevent "outbreak of war" by someone. And he announced that they would set up the south Korea-U.S. "Combined Air-force Command" in Osan, Kyonggi Province, and round off a new "operation plan" for invasion of the DPRK.
					
					 Recalling the facts, the statement stressed that the chief culprit threatening peace on the Korean Peninsula is none other than the U.S. troops who have been hell-bent on the ceaseless moves for a war of aggression after occupying south Korea. Nevertheless, the U.S. forces are pulling up the DPRK over "provocation," which reminds one of a thief crying "Stop thief!", it charged.
					
					 It pointed out that the U.S. is again making preparations for the Key Resolve joint military exercises intended to invade the DPRK in collusion with the south Korean war-like forces at the time when the danger of a war is inching close to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The statement demanded that the U.S. stop provocative war moves against the DPRK and immediately withdraw its forces from south Korea.

articles.title: Statement of KPA General Staff Spokesman Supported
articles.content:
Statement of KPA General Staff Spokesman Supported
 Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain issued a statement on Feb. 5 in support of the statement of a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army.
					 The statement expressed full support for the answer given by the spokesman for the General Staff of the KPA to a question raised by KCNA as regards the recent wicked behaviors of the traitor Lee Myung Bak group over the issue of the denuclearization on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					Traitor Lee Myung Bak is totally denying the achievements made by the north and the south for peaceful reunification over the past years and driving the situation of the Korean Peninsula to the brink of a war, the statement pointed out, charging that since he took office the traitor has defamed the dignity of the DPRK, clamoring about "preemptive strike" and "no nukes, opening and 3,000 dollars" pursuant to the policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 It branded the behaviors of the traitor, who calculates that they can buy the people of the DPRK with money, as a disgusting deed of those bereft of the elementary conception of the reality of the DPRK and its single-minded unity.
					
					 It said that what Lee, a stooge of imperialism and a traitor to the Korean nation and reunification, will face is only curses by all the Koreans.

articles.title: Chongryon Celebrates February Holiday
articles.content:
Chongryon Celebrates February Holiday
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- The Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) gave a reception at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Feb. 13 in celebration of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Attending it were Chief Vice-Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairmen of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the chairman of the Central Audit Committee of Chongryon, advisors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the director of the Research Institute on History of Korean Residents in Japan, directors of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, leading officials of central organizations and businesses under Chongryon, chairmen of Chongryon headquarters in Kanto area and Korean businessmen of commerce.
					
					 Present on invitation were personages of political, economic, the press, social and cultural circles in Japan and ambassadors and staff members of embassies of different countries, representatives of international organizations and correspondents to Japan.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said at the reception that Kim Jong Il has energetically provided field guidance to different units of the DPRK, including major factories and farms, from the outset of the year, arousing all the people to a new great revolutionary surge.
					
					 The people in the homeland are working fresh miracles and innovations in all domains of the economic construction in the new year in the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance, full of optimism and firm faith that they are sure to win as they are guided by Kim Jong Il, he stressed.
					
					 The DPRK has achieved a great victory in the standoff with the U.S. thanks to Kim Jong Il's outstanding Songun leadership and superb diplomatic stratagem, he noted, demanding that the Japanese authorities make a political decision to settle the past of Japan according to the DPRK-Japan Pyongyang Declaration and put the DPRK-Japan relations on a normal track, squarely seeing the trend of the times.

articles.title: Bulletins Issued to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
articles.content:
Bulletins Issued to Celebrate Kim Jong Il's Birthday
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Friendship organizations of different countries issued bulletins to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The Egypt-Korea Friendship Association released its bulletin titled "Kim Jong Il and his extraordinary leadership art" on Feb. 8, which  said that Kim Jong Il is a person possessed of rare leadership art. His leadership art is characterized by the ability to combine politics and military affairs organically before anything else and then by the persistent power of execution to carry through something determined to do, it added.
					
					 The politics of creation to solve everything in a unique way without adherence to the existing formula and usage, the brilliant flexible politics--this is another important aspect of Kim Jong Il's leadership art, the bulletin stressed.
					
					 The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued the first issue of its bulletin which carried such articles as "The birthday of the supreme leader of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea" and "The joint New Year editorial carried in leading newspapers of the DPRK" highly praising the glorious revolutionary history and the immortal exploits of the great man born of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Saying that all the achievements gained in the DPRK are linked with the august names of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, the bulletin introduced the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK and the anti-"government" struggle of the south Korean people.
					
					 The German Branch of the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain published the February issue of its bulletin which carried an article explaining about the advantages of the Korean socialist system centered on the popular masses.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised in Mexico
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised in Mexico
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, released a statement on Feb. 5 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 The statement described the birth of Kim Jong Il as a great event that promised the accomplishment of the Korean people's sacred cause, the liberation and independence of the country, the defence of the nation's dignity and sovereignty and the strengthening and development of socialist construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has pursued the Songun politics, leading the struggle of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people under the banner of the Juche idea by inheriting the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, it said.
					
					 The People's Socialist Party of Mexico joins the Korean people in celebrating Kim Jong Il's birthday as a great auspicious event and heartily wishes him good health for the victory of the cause of independence, it stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 15 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting, an art performance and a photo exhibition took place in Mongolia, round-table talks, a photo-exhibition and a film show in Iran and a lecture meeting and a Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition in Brazil on Feb. 3 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the venues of events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, photographs showing their exploits and books, photographs and handicrafts introducing the achievements gained by the Korean people in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Appreciated at the film show was a Korean film introducing Kim Jong Il's old home in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 Put on the stage were Korean songs including "Following the General" and Mongolian songs and dances.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the celebration meeting held in Mongolia.
